item.text: The world is fully playable (includes ores, trees, etc). Elevation has been scaled to fit the constraints of a Minecraft world. Sea level was adjusted to 40 blocks which puts Mt. Everest at 121 blocks high. The Earth was generated with various images from NASA (including landmass, satellite, elevation, and vegetation maps) using a custom python script incorporating codewarrior‚Äôs pymclevel python library

The The Earth Map for Minecraft 1.8.1, 1.7.10 and 1.7.2 is a very clever map that was made by the creator ‚Äòsalexp‚Äô. This map actually allows you to play a Minecraft map that very closely resembles Earth itself. This map was generated using various images from Nasa, and specs like landmass, elevation and even vegetation were all included! This map is very large, but if you are a fast enough computer then I think this is definitely worth a download!
